description.en:
A decentralized user-controlled layer 1 blockchain database maintained by a DAO.
On top of layer 1 will be built an ecosystem of DApps from social networking, gaming, financial (DeFi), and even a crypto clearing house with yield generating settlements - all overseen by user controlled DAO.
